sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Button, Typography, Container, Paper } from '@mui/material';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Container maxWidth="lg">
      {/* Background Image Section */}
      <Paper
        sx={{
          my: 4,
          py: 8,
          display: 'flex',
          flexDirection: 'column',
          alignItems: 'center',
          backgroundImage: 'url("https://source.unsplash.com/random/1600x900")',
          backgroundSize: 'cover',
          color: 'white',
          textAlign: 'center',
          height: '300px', // Adjust the height as needed
        }}
      >
        <Typography variant="h3" component="h1" gutterBottom>
          Welcome to Pet Rescue
        </Typography>
        <Button variant="contained" color="primary" component={Link} to="/report">
          Report a Pet
        </Button>
      </Paper>
      
      {/* Services Section */}
      <Box sx={{ my: 4, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center' }}>
        <Typography variant="h5" component="h2" gutterBottom>
          Our Services
        </Typography>
        <Box
          sx={{
            display: 'grid',
            gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(3, 1fr)',
            gap: 2,
            width: '100%',
            p: 2,
          }}
        >
          {/* Example Service */}
          <Paper sx={{ p: 2, textAlign: 'center' }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
              Pet Adoption
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1">
              Find your new best friend with our pet adoption service.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
          <Paper sx={{ p: 2, textAlign: 'center' }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
              Lost & Found Pets
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1">
              Report and search for lost and found pets in your area.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
          <Paper sx={{ p: 2, textAlign: 'center' }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
              Volunteer Opportunities
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1">
              Join our volunteer program and help pets in need.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default Home;
